name: smart-agriculture-system
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.install: cd backend/ && bun install && cd ../frontend/ && bun install && cd ../models/CropRecommendation/ && pip3 install -r requirements.txt --break-system-packages
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend/ && bun run dev" "cd frontend/ && bun start" "cd models/CropRecommendation/ && python3 ./app.py"
